named-query.name: findCanonicalReagentWellIds
named-query.query: select w.id from Well qw join qw.latestReleasedReagent qr, Well w join w.library l join w.latestReleasedReagent r where qw.id in (:wellIds) and w.facilityId = qw.facilityId and r.saltFormId = qr.saltFormId and r.facilityBatchId = 1 and l.shortName like 'R-%'
